defraud.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to trick a person or organization in order to get money from them
defraud.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: He faces charges of theft and conspiracy to defraud  (=a secret plan to cheat someone, made by two or more people).
She defrauded her employers of thousands of pounds.
defraud.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to gain money or goods from someone by saying or doing something dishonest
defraud.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: He admitted attempting to defraud the insurance company.
She defrauded her employers of thousands of pounds.
